meanings.definition: A small timepiece worn typically on a strap around the wrist.
meanings.sent1: She always wears her wristwatches to keep track of time.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new wristwatch for my brother's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The wristwatches decided to have a race to see who was the fastest timekeeper.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of wristwatches was a colorful array of timepieces.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ticking wristwatches filled the room with a rhythmic melody.

meanings.definition: A watch that is worn on a strap around the wrist.
meanings.sent1: He gifted her a beautiful wristwatch for their anniversary.
meanings.sent2: The wristwatch he wore was a classic design with a leather strap.
meanings.sent3: The wristwatch felt proud to be chosen as the best accessory for the party.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down as he stared at his wristwatch during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The wristwatch gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
